DialogueRecords.Text: Cyra! Wake up!
Cyra, get up you're going to get in trouble!

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Cyra
DialogueRecords.Text: Mhm...
Ugh. I knew this would happen... Shame on your sisters for keeping you up with their chores.
* SMACK *

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Cyra
DialogueRecords.Text: ACK!

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Mr. Henrick
DialogueRecords.Text: I hope you enjoyed your nap Cyra.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Cyra
DialogueRecords.Text: Oh, I-- I'm sorry Mr. Henrick. I didn't get much sleep last night.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Mr. Henrick
DialogueRecords.Text: I'll let it slide this time. Next time you'll be seeing me after class.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Ivona
DialogueRecords.Text: Hmm... maybe I shouldn't have smacked you so hard.
[Cyra glares at Ivona. She's lucky no one in class could see her.]
[Cyra nods her head awake. She looks around the class. No one looks up from their desk.]
[Ivona perches on her desk and hops up and down to make sure Cyra is awake. She's lucky only Cyra can see her right now.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Ivona
DialogueRecords.Text: Stay awake Cyra! Class is almost over.
[Cyra gives her an apologetic smile.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Cyra
DialogueRecords.Text: Right, right. Thank you, Ivona.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Mr. Henrick
DialogueRecords.Text: Alright. Remember class, I need you to read chapters 1-4 of 'How to Kill a Pigeon' this weekend.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Male Student
DialogueRecords.Text: Uh, I think something is wrong with my copy.
[Mr. Henrick sighs. He scratches his head in annoyance.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Mr. Henrick
DialogueRecords.Text: I check all the copies myself. Nice try--

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Male Student
DialogueRecords.Text: No, Mr. Henrick. My pages are blank!

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Ivona
DialogueRecords.Text: Hmm?
[Mr. Henrick stares at the student before he walks over and picks up his book. His expression grows more puzzled as he flips through the pages.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Female Student
DialogueRecords.Text: Hey! My book is blank too! I could've sworn I saw the pages yesterday...
[Murmurs erupt across the class as students flip through their book to find blank pages.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Mr. Henrick
DialogueRecords.Text: Is this some kind of prank!?
[Mr. Henrick frantically goes from student to student and grabs their books to be greeted by none other than blank pages.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Cyra
DialogueRecords.Text: Ivona, did something--

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Ivona
DialogueRecords.Text: A labrinyth has opened up in the school.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Cyra
DialogueRecords.Text: J-just now?

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Ivona
DialogueRecords.Text: It's alright. Just as we practiced. Act natural and let's get the other girls.
[The school bell rings. Mr. Henrick nearly jumps out of his shoes.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Mr. Henrick
DialogueRecords.Text: Alright, I don’t know whose idea of a prank this is but... you will not have homework for this weekend.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Mr. Henrick
DialogueRecords.Text: I have to make some calls.
[The class hoots and hollers as they collect their things and leave the classroom. Cyra grabs her backpack and follows suit.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Cyra
DialogueRecords.Text: Okay, so I guess we got to find the labryinth entrance and then stop things from getting out of hand--

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Ivona
DialogueRecords.Text: HOLD IT THERE YOUNG LADY!
[The little magical cockatoo flaps her wings in your face in exasperation.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Ivona
DialogueRecords.Text: LABRYINTH OR NOT, YOU HAVE TO FINISH SCHOOL TODAY!

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Ivona
DialogueRecords.Text: My conscious will not rest if I interrupt your schooling in anyway!

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Cyra
DialogueRecords.Text: But, Ivona--

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Ivona
DialogueRecords.Text: Go to your next class! Let's keep a look out for any oddities in the school so we can find the labryinth entrance.
[Cyra nods and takes one step and stops.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Cyra
DialogueRecords.Text: Uh... I forgot my schedule at home. Do you remember my next class?

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Ivona
DialogueRecords.Text: What am I going to do with you?

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Cyra
DialogueRecords.Text: Sorry...

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Ivona
DialogueRecords.Text: You're going to algebra. Just in case you also lost your sense of direction that's located #2880E0FF straight ahead and down the hallway to your right.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Ivona
DialogueRecords.Text: Your algebra classroom will be the #2880E0FF first door on your left. #FFFFFFFF I'll mark it on your map with a star when you get close.
[In front of the door you’re greeted by Wren and Angélia. Angélia nods in greeting while Wren bursts into a big grin as she starts to chant.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Wren
DialogueRecords.Text: Labryinth! Labryinth!
[Angélia elbows the girl. Wren hisses as she massages her own arm.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Angélia
DialogueRecords.Text: Could you be any louder?

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Ivona
DialogueRecords.Text: I see you girls have also noticed a labryinth has opened somewhere in the school as well.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Angélia
DialogueRecords.Text: It's obvious. I was in history class and everything got weird. Mrs. Keith was mid lesson then just... froze there.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Angélia
DialogueRecords.Text: She snapped out of it and just dismissed us early. It was like she forgot why she was even here.
[Wren nods her head aggressively as she listens to Angélia speak.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Cyra
DialogueRecords.Text: Err, what happened to you then Wren?

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Wren
DialogueRecords.Text: Um...

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Angélia
DialogueRecords.Text: She skipped class.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Wren
DialogueRecords.Text: I did skip class.
[Wren grins as she says it, not ashamed in the slightest despite the death glare she gets from Ivona.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Ivona
DialogueRecords.Text: After class, we should do some investigating to find out where that labryinth entrance is.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Wren
DialogueRecords.Text: Alright, but where do we start looking?
Script: Go to the library after class
Case Go to the library after class

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Cyra
DialogueRecords.Text: I don't know. The cafeteria seems pretty big. Wouldn't a labryinth entrance fit there?

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Wren
DialogueRecords.Text: Uh, did you miss breakfast? Why would it be in there?
[Angélia shakes her head.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Angélia
DialogueRecords.Text: Shouldn't we check the library? Most of these occurrences have something to do with books. It makes the most sense to go there first at least.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Cyra
DialogueRecords.Text: Oh, yeah. Right.
[Cyra deflates, embarrassed.]
[Ivona flies up to perch on her shoulder and nuzzles her cheek.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Ivona
DialogueRecords.Text: It's alright darling. You're all new to this. You'll get better.
[Cyra smiles, appreciating Ivona's comfort.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Cyra
DialogueRecords.Text: The library just makes sense doesn't it? I think if we go there we're bound to find something useful to finding the entrance.
[Ivona nods her head in approval.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Ivona
DialogueRecords.Text: Bright idea, Cyra!

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Angélia
DialogueRecords.Text: Yeah, I'd say the same thing.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Cyra
DialogueRecords.Text: Alright, then it's settled. Let's take a peek inside the library after class!

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Angélia
DialogueRecords.Text: I'll meet you there but I'm not really too familiar with the way to the library yet.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Cyra
DialogueRecords.Text: Oh! That's right. You’re still getting used to the classes here. Just continue #2880E0FF further down this hall, then take a left at the intersection.
[This door leads to a class already in session. Best not to interrupt them.]
[This door has been locked for the night.]
[You can't leave yet! There's still a mission to complete.]
[You overhear other students loudly sharing some rumors.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Laid-Back Student
DialogueRecords.Text: Dude, did your hear Principal Reed is acting weird today?

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Slacker Student
DialogueRecords.Text: Whaddaya mean?

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Laid-Back Student
DialogueRecords.Text: Someone said he was tearing pages out of all those books in his office.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Slacker Student
DialogueRecords.Text: Bro? I thought those were like his babies!
[Another student is walking your way from the library and stops to talk.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Stylish Student
DialogueRecords.Text: Hey, are you guys heading to the library??

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Cyra
DialogueRecords.Text: Uh, yes! Why?

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Stylish Student
DialogueRecords.Text: Don't bother. Principal Reed is blocking the door and he's acting weird.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Angélia
DialogueRecords.Text: How so?

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Stylish Student
DialogueRecords.Text: I had a book I checked out a month ago thats due today. So, of course I come to return it because I don't want to pay a late fee because I'm broke and it's super lame--

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Angélia
DialogueRecords.Text: Get to the point.
[The Stylish Student gasps as she places a hand on her heart with her mouth still agape.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Stylish Student
DialogueRecords.Text: Rude! I was going to say he blocked me from going inside and told me to just get rid of the book!

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Stylish Student
DialogueRecords.Text: What am I supposed to do with this? This is school property not mine!

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Wren
DialogueRecords.Text: Well... free is free?

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Stylish Student
DialogueRecords.Text: Oh please. I'll celebrate a free gift card to GlossMart, not a moderately used book.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Cyra
DialogueRecords.Text: Thank you for the warning. I think we'll still stop by to see what's going on.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Stylish Student
DialogueRecords.Text: Suit yourself!
[Cyra, Wren, and Angélia stop in their tracks as a hulking figure of a man stands in their way with his fists balled.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Principal Reed
DialogueRecords.Text: The library is closed until further notice! Keep walking!

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Cyra
DialogueRecords.Text: We don't mean to be rude Principal Reed but how come?
[The man looks at Cyra in surprise, as if this is the most incredulous question he's ever heard in his life. The irritation practically radiates off of him.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Principal Reed
DialogueRecords.Text: These books have become nothing but a nuisance by plaguing the minds of the youth! Better yet, I want to BAN books.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Wren
DialogueRecords.Text: BAN? You’ve got to be joking!
[Principal Reed gains a strange fiery glow. Ivona who has been silent this whole time lets out a gasp.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Principal Reed
DialogueRecords.Text: Why would I be joking? Don’t talk back to me!
[A strange energy seeps from the man.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Ivona
DialogueRecords.Text: This man is obviously blocking the entrance to the labyrinth but we need something to trigger the entrance. There's no way for you to get in there now!
[Before Principal Reed could say anything more Angélia grabs Cyra and Wren and pushes them along.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Angélia
DialogueRecords.Text: We got all the information we needed. Let's come back tonight and fix this before anything worse happens. The door will be open by then, we don't need to provoke him anymore.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Wren
DialogueRecords.Text: A minute longer and I'm sure he would've bitten our heads off... all at once.
[You all leave the library entrance and carry out your school day. The four of you make preparations to enter The Library Labyrinth.]
[Cyra opens a door and steps into the dark halls of the school. It's an eerie aura compared to the bustle and noisiness of it in the day time. Ivona perches on her shoulder.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Ivona
DialogueRecords.Text: It's a miracle the school hasn't ever been broken into with how easy to find the spares are found...

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Cyra
DialogueRecords.Text: I don't see Wren and Angélia yet. Let's wait in front of the library.
[The closer Cyra gets to the door the more she feels the corrupted energy seep under the door from the library.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Ivona
DialogueRecords.Text: This energy... the labyrinth entrance is open. Your principal must have been called to the labyrinth. Be careful!
[Just as Ivona's warning leaves her beak, monsters materialize in front of the entrance of the library.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Cyra
DialogueRecords.Text: It looks like its too late for that. They're here!
[Cyra raises her hand in the air and sparkles descend unto her body as her clothes change to her pink dress. Ivona goes into a panic.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Ivona
DialogueRecords.Text: Cyra, don't be brash! You can't handle them alone!

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Wren
DialogueRecords.Text: She doesn't have to!
Wren and Angélia race down the hall in their own magical girl attire.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Wren
DialogueRecords.Text: Phew. We're so sorry we got here so late. Someone stole my bike and we had to walk.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Wren
DialogueRecords.Text: I didn't think the labyrinth would send monsters to defend the entrance yet.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Angélia
DialogueRecords.Text: I'm sorry. I'll look into saving for my own bike in the future.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Cyra
DialogueRecords.Text: Let's not dwell on this. You're here now and we're all okay. That's all that matters. Let's go save Principal Reed.
[The girls agree as they open the library door and all take a step forward.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Wren
DialogueRecords.Text: [The walls of the labyrinth twist and turn. The girls find themselves feeling as if the halls could go on for eternity if they didn't know better.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Ivona
DialogueRecords.Text: Your principal is in here. Stay close to one another. I cannot aid you in battle but I will be your guide when needed, just as we practiced.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Angélia, Cyra, and Wren
DialogueRecords.Text: Right!
[The girls rush forward to see Principal Reed standing with a dazed expression on his face.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Cyra
DialogueRecords.Text: Principal Reed, hold on! We're here to help!
[The man's face contorts his skin ripples as if something lived underneath!]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Principal Reed
DialogueRecords.Text: Help? Who says I need help?

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Cyra
DialogueRecords.Text: Principal Reed--

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Principal Reed
DialogueRecords.Text: This power has opened my eyes! First Adriann Lake, then next-- THE WORLD! I'll rid the world of books and push my OWN education.
[Principal Reed's body is then engulfed in a black shadow. Cyra takes a step forward but Wren grabs her arm.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Wren
DialogueRecords.Text: We can't talk to him like this! We just have to beat him.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Corrupted Principal Reed
DialogueRecords.Text: BEAT ME? HA!

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Corrupted Principal Reed
DialogueRecords.Text: COME AT ME AND I’LL TEACH YOU ALL A LESSON YOU'LL NEVER FORGET!

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Wren
DialogueRecords.Text: [The walls of the labyrinth twist and turn. The girls find themselves feeling as if the halls could go on for eternity if they didn't know better.]

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Ivona
DialogueRecords.Text: Your principal is in here. Stay close to one another. I cannot aid you in battle but I will be your guide when needed, just as we practiced.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Angélia, Cyra, and Wren
DialogueRecords.Text: Right!

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Inventor
DialogueRecords.Text: Your repairs are all finished now. You should construct some companions if you're having trouble in battle.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Inventor
DialogueRecords.Text: Be careful out there, and check the scrapyard #F3C14CFF northeast #FFFFFFFF of here if you need more parts to build drone companions.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Inventor
DialogueRecords.Text: Your repairs are all finished now. Take care of yourself out there.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: $Party.0
DialogueRecords.Text: Where are my companions? Did you find any of them at the scrapyard?

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Inventor
DialogueRecords.Text: No, I only found you. Your companions will scatter if you're disabled in battle, but you can recruit or rebuild them again.

DialogueRecords.Speaker: Inventor
DialogueRecords.Text: Your repairs are all finished now. Take care of yourself out there.
